titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the distribution of remaining balances in flexible spending arrangements upon termination from employment.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 12/15/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, without penalty, a participant in an employer-sponsored health or dependent care flexible spending arrangement to withdraw any remaining balance in such plans at the time such participant is separated from employment.
